title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same REST wrapper as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain as a local LLM/embedding backend.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly ollama-webui); chat with multiple models, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j – Java Client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints; streaming chat, pull, list, etc.

title: OllamaSharp – .NET Client
summary: .NET library for C# devs; exposes chat, completion, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rag – CLI RAG helper
summary: Lightweight Python CLI to build retrieval-augmented-generation pipelines over local documents.

title: ollama-copilot – GitHub Copilot clone
summary: Experimental VS-Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat – Flutter mobile app
summary: Unofficial Flutter chat client for Android/iOS that talks to any Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli – Rust TUI
summary: Rust terminal UI for chatting, model switching and logs; uses the REST API under the hood.

title: ollama-gui – Electron desktop app
summary: Simple Electron wrapper giving a native window for Ollama chats with markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dl – Model downloader script
summary: Bash script to pre-download GGUF models from Hugging Face into Ollama’s cache without running the server.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision an Ollama instance on AWS EC2 with NVIDIA GPU.

title: r/ollama – Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama integrations.

title: ollama-haystack – Haystack integration
summary: Small adapter letting Haystack pipelines use Ollama as a local generative or embedding node.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama inside no-code workflows; supports chat and completion endpoints.

title: ollama-codex – CLI coding assistant
summary: Terminal tool inspired by OpenAI Codex but backed by Ollama; explains, refactors and generates code.

title: ollama-models – Community registry
summary: Curated list of user-submitted Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready to pull into Ollama.
